text: Prospective , active surveillance was conducted in PICUs of paediatric hospitals in Bavaria , Germany . On December 31 st , 2010 roughly 2 , 001 , 700 children < 17 years of age were registered in Bavaria [ 21 ] , representing 16 % of the German population in this age group [ 22 ] . The annual study population was defined as the sub - group of all children in Bavaria at least 1 month and < 17 years of age .
